channel.title: Honest Tea Talk
channel.description: Three Muslim women get together and have honest conversations about the things we desperately need to talk about, as women and as an ummah.
channel.author: Honest Tea Talk
channel.itunes:author: Honest Tea Talk
channel.itunes:summary: Three Muslim women get together and have honest conversations about the things we desperately need to talk about, as women and as an ummah.

item.title: Taking Action // Season 2 Finale, Episode 11 | Honest Tea Talk
item.description:
In this final episode of Season 2, we highlight what it means to take action, and hope to motivate you to do just that.  

WANT US TO BE BACK WITH SEASON 3? We can only do that with your help! Donate via:

— GoFundMe: https://www.gofundme.com/honestteatalk— PayPal: https://bit.ly/HTTdonate

JOIN THE DISCUSSION:

— Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/honestteatalk/— Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/honestteatalk/— Twitter: https://twitter.com/honestteatalk

GET UPDATES: Sign up at https://bit.ly/honestteatalk

___  

About Honest Tea Talk with Aliyah, LaYinka & Sumayah  Inspired by Jada Pinkett-Smith's 'Red Table Talk', 3 Muslim women have set up a platform to speak openly and honestly, giving viewers an unedited insight into the minds and life of Muslim women. Honest Tea Talk brings deep and often unspoken topics to the table to lay down our masks and start much-needed discussions about matters related to Muslim women and the ummah at large.  

© 2020

item.title: Jealousy // Season 2 Episode 10 | Honest Tea Talk
item.description:
In this episode, we talk about the dangers of jealousy, and the real impact it can have on a person's life.

item.title: Life After Abuse // Season 2 Episode 6 | Honest Tea Talk
item.description:
**TRIGGER WARNING: SEXUAL ABUSE**

In this episode, we talk with our guest Mayameen Miftahi, an Award-Winning Trauma Specialist & Sexual Violence Expert by Lived Experience, Independent Advocate, Fitness Instructor & TEDx Speaker. She's also the founder of She Can Consultancy, where she provides specialist practical and emotional support for Survivors of Sexual Violence and Psychological Trauma. Find out more at: https://shecanconsultancy.com/

WANT SEASON 3?

We can only do that with your help! Donate via:

— GoFundMe: https://www.gofundme.com/honestteatalk
— PayPal: https://bit.ly/HTTdonate

JOIN THE DISCUSSION:

— Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/honestteatalk/
— Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/honestteatalk/
— Twitter: https://twitter.com/honestteatalk

GET UPDATES: Sign up at https://bit.ly/honestteatalk

___  

About

Honest Tea Talk with Aliyah, LaYinka & Sumayah  Inspired by Jada Pinkett-Smith's 'Red Table Talk', 3 Muslim women have set up a platform to speak openly and honestly, giving viewers an unedited insight into the minds and life of Muslim women. Honest Tea Talk brings deep and often unspoken topics to the table to lay down our masks and start much-needed discussions about matters related to Muslim women and the ummah at large.  

© 2020

item.title: When You're Tested // Season 2 Episode 4 | Honest Tea Talk
item.description:
In this episode, we talk about a topic that affects absolutely everyone: the tests, trials and difficulties of life. Everyone has been tested, is being tested, or will be tested.   What tools have helped you cope with the most trying tests of your life?  

WANT SEASON 3? We can only do that with your help! Donate via:

— GoFundMe: https://www.gofundme.com/honestteatalk
— PayPal: https://bit.ly/HTTdonate JOIN THE DISCUSSION:
— Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/honestteatalk/
— Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/honestteatalk/

item.title: Women Supporting Women // Season 2 Episode 3 | Honest Tea Talk
item.description:
In this episode, we have talk about the importance of women supporting women with award-winning author and international speaker, Na'ima B Robert.  Download her free ebook, Be The Hero here: http://bit.ly/giftfromNaima

item.title: Heartbreak // Season 2 Episode 2 | Honest Tea Talk
item.description:
In this episode, we talk about a topic that is very rarely spoken about in the Muslim community:  Heartbreak.   What has been your experience of speaking about heartbreak with others, and how have you managed heartbreak in the past?  

WANT SEASON 3?

We can only do that with your help! item.title: Honest Tea Talk Episode 14 // Intimacy (final episode in season 1)
item.description:
Honest Tea Talk: A New Show by Muslim Women — raw, real, honest.

Featuring Aliyah Quadri (Umm Raiyaan)— Solace | Sisters Achieve, LaYinka Sanni— Evolve & Emerge and Sumayah Hassan— Recite & Reflect.

Join the discussion on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/honestteatalk/

Unlike Anything Out There.

_______

For the longest time, Muslim women have been brilliant at wearing masks, and this has been to our detriment. Honest and real conversations rarely go beyond closed doors, which can often leave some sisters feel like they're the only one going through things.  Honest Tea Talk brings deep and often unspoken topics to the table to lay down our masks and start much-needed discussions about matters related to Muslim women and the ummah at large.  3 Muslim women have set up a platform to speak openly and honestly, giving viewers an unedited insight into the minds and life of Muslim women.

HONEST TEA TALK NEEDS YOUR HELP!  Please donate whatever you can — really, everything counts —so we can continue bringing real, deep, and unspoken topics to the table.  Donate at:

— https://www.gofundme.com/honestteatalk

— http://bit.ly/HTTdonate

item.title: Honest Tea Talk Episode 12 // Losing Religion
item.description:
Honest Tea Talk: A New Show by Muslim Women — raw, real, honest.

Featuring Aliyah Quadri (Umm Raiyaan)— Solace | Sisters Achieve, LaYinka Sanni— Evolve & Emerge and Sumayah Hassan— Recite & Reflect.

Join the discussion on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/honestteatalk/

Unlike Anything Out There.

_______

For the longest time, Muslim women have been brilliant at wearing masks, and this has been to our detriment. Honest and real conversations rarely go beyond closed doors, which can often leave some sisters feel like they're the only one going through things.  Honest Tea Talk brings deep and often unspoken topics to the table to lay down our masks and start much-needed discussions about matters related to Muslim women and the ummah at large.  3 Muslim women have set up a platform to speak openly and honestly, giving viewers an unedited insight into the minds and life of Muslim women.

HONEST TEA TALK NEEDS YOUR HELP!  Please donate whatever you can — really, everything counts —so we can continue bringing real, deep, and unspoken topics to the table.  Donate at:

— https://www.gofundme.com/honestteatalk

— http://bit.ly/HTTdonate
